replies.body:
The other two players in your game must have found it offensive and stressful to see.

Being with friends is great, but that doesn't guarantee that others will be able to tell you are joking. Even if the humor is directed at someone you know, it can still negatively impact another player's game.

You could be joking with your friend and using the N-word. Could call each other it, and sure it's fine with you two because you both know it is a joke. But another person won't know that and they could be upset and hurt by your words. It doesn't matter if they aren't directed at that other player, because they can still see them and it still affects them.

My suggestion: keep this sort of humor in your private discord chat. It's fine to trash talk with friends if everybody involved is okay with it. When you bring it into the game's chat with others who are not aware of the satire of your humor, they could take it seriously and it could ruin their experience.

Yeah the Miss Fortune on my team(not the one I was calling op) was saying to stop typing and start playing, even though i was 17/5 or somewhere around there. I probably should have told him/her I was joking around with my friend.

I will keep it to my own discord from now on.
Best of luck to you then.
Thank you.

That's because they take Hate Speech extremely serious and have stated that such terms can instantly jump to a ban.
So many people have said kys to me and I never got a report back saying they got banned, even though I clearly explained exactly what happened.

Getting one of those messages is fairly rare, and not getting one is not an indication that they did not get punished. You have to have reported them in the last game that they played, and it doesn't always send one out even in that case.

I have had a case where a friend and I both reported the same player and I was the only one that got the message. There was another case where another friend and I reported a player and we both received it.
You won't always get that message, as they changed it to only the last person who reported seems to get the message, at least that's what i was told, don't quote me on that.
He said "Kys" quite a few times, so yes, it can be the first punishment and be a 2 Week Ban.
be happy they giving you a chance you said enough to be perm ban from the bat

While the kys may be an inside joke between you and your friend; neither the system, nor other players know this. They think you are being serious. In addition to that the "Running it down mid" May have gotten flagged.

If you keep your nose clean while playing you will eventually begin to receive rewards again. After that continue to keep out of trouble and you will drop in the punishment progression.

Riot have specific rules against vegetables in chat.

I'm sorry.
I acknowledge the things I said were toxic and reportable, but they were all in good fun and nothing serious, and not directed towards any of the other team mates.
